scripts.install: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.cleanProd: rm -rf client/node_modules client/package-lock.json client/dist server/dist server/node_modules server/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
